highlights.chapter: Introduction: What This Book Expects to Accomplish
highlights.quote: Comparatively little will be said here about the technique of analyzing securities; attention will be paid chiefly to investment principles and investors‚Äô attitudes
highlights.note: Attitudes. Again, this is a book about psychology and emotions, echoed in Mark Douglas‚Äôs book.

highlights.chapter: A Note About Benjamin Graham, by Jason Zweig
highlights.quote: In the end, how your investments behave is much less important than how you behave.

highlights.chapter: A Note About Benjamin Graham, by Jason Zweig
highlights.quote: For the rest of his life, Ben would recall the humiliation of cashing a check for his mother and hearing the bank teller ask, ‚ÄúIs Dorothy Grossbaum good for five dollars?‚Äù
highlights.note: Yeah, this will start off an obsession with money

highlights.quote: Ben Graham, then almost eighty, expressed to a friend the thought that he hoped every day to do ‚Äúsomething foolish, something creative and something generous
